meta.name: keyword
meta.content: jameleon, Automated, Test, Testing, automated testing, changes, changelog

release.action: Jameleon-core requires Java 5 to compile and run.
Hovers don't work in IE6 for Test Case Docs
3.3-M5 requires Java 6 to run
Failed HTML Test Case Docs display malformatted under IE 7
HTML Results don't use the testCaseDocsEncoding setting
HTML Test Case Docs 'data' values are duplicate

Upgrade Info - If upgrading from 3.2, be sure to read the change log for all 3.3-Mx releases. Be sure to remove all previous Jameleon jar files and required dependencies (everything in the lib directory) before installing.
Total revamp of HTML test results, including timestamp support and results are actual execution steps.
Disabled Jiffie Action Point Generator due to Jiffie 1.0 upgrade.
Add clear HTML results button to GUI
View HTML results in GUI by clicking on status icon of the test case result
Add back/forward button to HtmlBrowser in GUI
Upgrade to Jiffie 1.0 - fixes VM crashes
Upgrade to HtmlUnit 1.14
Upgrade to Jaxen 1.1.1
Upgrade to Selenium-RC 0.9.2
Remove Log4j Dependencies by refactoring results
add button to UI which opens the test runs summary HTML results
Upgrade to Velocity 1.5
Make the two ExecuteTestCase Ant tasks execute the same way
Add an abstract isParent() method to JameleonTestResult
Add className to FunctionalPoint
Add date and time in the test case result docs
Add a link to the API docs and xref src for each tag
Syntax Reference Generator should key from Class and not tag
AbstactSqlTag doesn't need to implement store method
deprecate SessionTag.trace() to be replaced with traceMsg
trace() and traceMsg() should always log to debug.
Add timeoutSeconds support for selenium session tag
[selenium-plugin] add support for waitForCondition
[selenium-plugin] add support for waitForValue
Switch jameleon-core to use the syntax generator
Improve performance in registering and loading tags
replace xjavadoc with qdox
Added Watij plugin
Add JameleonUnitTestCase for help with debugging
Separation of installation base from the scripts and results
Separate report for each test suite execution
Generate test case docs based on actual execution
unexpected error using jiffie plug-in
sql tag doesn't work for SQL Server 2005
res empty in jameleon-test-suite-3.3-M4.zip
Closing snapshot and bug browser under Mac OS X kills GUI
sql tag doesn't support JDBC drivers w/o previous() support
wait tag delay is applied even after a failure
Unchecking "Generate Docs" does nothing
GUI TestReport Duplicate TC Hidden
no cleanup after failed tag
Annoying error when snapshot fails in Jiffie
selenium-assert-field-value-equals throws unjust exception
remove Javadoc2Bean unused methods
Custom configuration files are ignored by SupportedTags.java
TestCaseListeners broken against ExecuteTestCaseTask
Selenium Plugin Example Failing under Windows 2000
Test could fail if a tag has no default value defined
map-variable variableType is case sensitive
Possible out of memory problems using jellys setCacheTags
jameleon.application is ignored in the GUI
deprecate lastFileWritten (mostly for plug-ins)
web site link - getting-started.html
Core Tag documentation in Java source needs improvement
TestCase can have the same test level multiple times
Tag documentation trims all Javadoc whitespace/new lines
maven site no longer works due to changes in ibiblio
The API docs don't reference the libraries they implement
test-case and test-suite tags include invalid xhtml in docs
gen-syntax-ref generates duplicate entries
JagacyFunctionTag.readField doesn't work
JagacyFunctionTag.readField doesn't work
Selenium Plug-in - The Selenium RC plug-in is being released as an experimental plug-in. Jeff Tulley helped significantly with this plug-in.
Jiffie Plug-in - slow-down due to bug Id 1559308. Thanks to Brennon for providing a reproducable test case that greatly assisted me in finding this.
Jameleon core - When test case meta tags are used in a test-suite tag, the script silently fails.
Jameleon core - make FunctionTag.delay methods public.
Jameleon core - Code cleanup.
Jameleon GUI - Add tooltips to results.
Jameleon core - Add data-drivable row data (variables read in from data source) into results.
Jameleon core - Add countRow back into data-drivable results objects.
Upgrade Info - Read the install documentation for more information on upgrading to this new release.
Jameleon GUI - Ability to change jameleon.config settings on the fly
Jameleon core - Add Upgrade Ant Task to make required config changes
Jameleon core - Change Environment.properties to jameleon.conf
Jameleon core - Consolidate jameleon-gui.props into jameleon.conf
Jameleon core - change classpath.dir and classpath.file to classpath.entry
Jameleon core - Add test-suite/test-script tags
Jameleon GUI - Open a link to a bug in a browser for test case docs
Jameleon GUI - Add basic About Dialog box for version info
Jameleon GUI - Add table column sorting to GUI
Jameleon GUI - Upgrade to JDIC 20061102, adding Mac OS X support
Jameleon GUI - Bad error when script XML is invalid
Jameleon core - TestCaseTagLibrary to use a single instance of SupportedTags
Jameleon core - Errors aren't reported for errors in testcase tags
Jameleon core - Simple results (console results) still report rowNum
Jameleon core - UI sets a new classpath for every script being executed
Jameleon core - handle ThreadDeath errors
Jameleon GUI - UI should only create one ExecuteTestCase instance
Jameleon core - Upgrade to jaxen-1.1-beta-11.jar
Jameleon core - expectFailure when using multiple asserts in custom tag
Jameleon core - Be able to set TestCaseListeners in jameleon.conf
Jameleon core - Upgrade to Log4j 1.2.14, removing custom patch
HtmlUnit Plug-in - Upgrade to HtmlUnit 1.10
HtmlUnit Plug-in - Add htmlunit-record-alerts tag
Jagacy Plug-in - Upgrade to Jagacy 1.3
Jiffie Plug-in - IEFireEvent doesn't fail if xpath and htmlElement are used
Jiffie Plug-in - Add href attribute which support regex to ie-click-link tag.
Jiffie Plug-in - ie-set-select-field doesn't fire js event on optionIndex
JUnit Plug-in - ju-assert-equals fails when comparing differing object types
Jameleon Site - RSS HTML Link typo
Jameleon Test Suite - Current sample plugin scripts fail against latest sf changes

Jameleon Core - Complete refactor of the results. For those that coded against the results, you will likely need to make some modifications. As a result of this refactor, the TestResults.xml file is completely different and there were some modifications to the GUI results and the TestResults.html. If you use TestResults.xml to do reporting, it is a good idea to start looking into the event (net.sf.jameleon.event package) model that is built into Jameleon. Please note that the changes are still ongoing. If you are interested in the direction of the results, please feel free to ask in the forums or one of the mailing lists.
Jameleon GUI - display errors while the tests are being executed
Jameleon GUI - display hightlighted source when line # is clicked on
Jiffie plug-in - ie-session clickYesOnSecurityAlert is always false
Jiffie plug-in - ie-session clickYesOnSecurityAlert is misspelled
Jiffie plug-in - IHTMLElementFinder.getIHTMLElement bug
Jameleon GUI - debug doesn't always unhighlight/highlight the source
Jameleon GUI - throws NullPointerException when selecting directory
Jameleon GUI - svn files are viewable in GUI
Jameleon GUI - shows wrong test case docs when multi selected
Jameleon core - test passes even if CVS file has invalid format
HtmlUnit plug-in - set input field tags blow up when null is passed.
Jameleon core - bad error message when function tag is not under session tag
HtmlUnit plug-in - enableSslCertCheck doesn't work when set to false
JUnit plug-in - execute-jameleon-script clears test execution #'s
Site Docs - better docs on Registering Function Tags Ant Task
Jameleon core - dataDrivable tags should not know about Map implementation
Jameleon core - jameleonUtility.getFileNameFromPath broken for path in files
Jameleon core - abstractFileDrivableTag.setFileName should be setFile
Jameleon core - can't set scriptsDir outside of current working directory
Jameleon core - support direct attributes in testcase, session and data tags
Jameleon core - remove support for testBlock(XMLOutput out)
Jameleon core - auto-generate the syntax reference for plug-ins.
Jameleon core - keep references to all Exceptions in results
Jiffie plug-in - add ie-execute-javascript tag
Jameleon core - replace Row Num with line # on the first page
JUnit plug-in - make execute-jameleon-script more useful. Many changes were made to this that are not backward compatable
Jameleon core - upgrade to latest jelly 1.0
Jiffie plug-in - add ability for session to keep browser open
Jameleon core - make warnOnNoPluginsFound a global variable
Jameleon core - add a short description to FunctionalPoint
Jameleon core - remove unused FunctionalPoint constructor
Jameleon core - add a syntax-reference generator Ant Task
Jameleon core - pull X509TrustEverythingManager out of JsseSettings.
HtmlUnit plug-in - upgrade to HtmlUnit 1.9
HtmlUnit plug-in - upgrade to commons-lang-2.1
HtmlUnit plug-in - upgrade to commons-io-1.2
HtmlUnit plug-in - upgrade to commons-httpclient-3.0.1

Jameleon core - upgrade to commons-logging-1.1.jar
Jameleon core - upgrade to commons-collections-3.2
Jameleon core - upgrade to JUnit 3.8.2
Jiffie plug-in - simplify Acceptance Tests for examples
HttpUnit plug-in - simplify Acceptance Tests for examples
HtmlUnit plug-in - simplify Acceptance Tests for examples
Jameleon core - remove so many references to xml namespaces in examples
JUnit plug-in - refactor JUnit assert tags
Jameleon core - refactor the logging Layouts
Jameleon core - simplify Results
JUnit plug-in - add a ju-assert-null tag
Selenium plug-in - add a Selenium Plugin
Jameleon core - add FunctionTag.getStringOrDefault() method
Jameleon core - add ContextHelper.getValueAs[type]WithConfig
Jameleon core - add ContextHelper.getVariableAsInt()
Jameleon core - add new TestSuite and DataDrivable result classes
Jameleon core - new JameleonExceptions which are RuntimeExceptions
